## Frogs

### White's Tree Frog

White's tree frogs are very cute frogs.

## Newts

### Taricha

> "I love terrorizing taricha" - Taricha Terrorist

::: {.callout-warning}
## A warning:
Taricha newts produce a highly deadly neurotoxin, tetrodotoxin! Do not consume! You can touch them though.
